category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_skip_root_task_from_acl_evaluation
preference.preference_description: Enables the ACL (Access Control List) accessor evaluation on Workflow root task. Valid Values: * true: Skip root task for ACL evaluation. * false: Consider root task for ACL evaluation. This is the default value.
